    • 构造器详细资料

      • WebDriverWebTable

        public WebDriverWebTable(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                 org.openqa.selenium.By tabFinder)
        construct with parameters initialize
        参数:
        driver - the WebDriver instance
        tabFinder - the By locator of the table

    • 方法详细资料

      • rowCount

        public int rowCount()
        get row count of a webtable
        返回:
        the row count of the table

      • colCount

        public int colCount(int rowNum)
        get column count of a specified webtable row.
        参数:
        rowNum - row index of your table to count
        返回:
        the column count of the row in table

      • childItem

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement childItem(int row,
                                       int col,
                                       java.lang.String type,
                                       int index)
        get the element in the table cell by row and col index.
        参数:
        row - row index of the table.
        col - column index of the table.
        type - the element type, such as "img"/"a"/"input"...
        index - element index in the specified cell, begins with 1.
        返回:
        the table cell WebElement

      • cellText

        public java.lang.String cellText(int row,
                        int col)
        get the cell text of the table on specified row and column.
        参数:
        row - row index of the table.
        col - column index of the table.
        返回:
        the cell text

      • childsGetter

        private java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> childsGetter(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement father,
                                                          java.lang.String elementClass)
        button/edit/checkbox are using the same html tag "input", others may be the same, this method will get the WebElements List accord the user element classes.
        参数:
        father - the father element to get childs
        elementClass - link/button/edit/checkbox/image/list and so on
        返回:
        the WebElements List

      • elementTagGetter

        private java.lang.String elementTagGetter(java.lang.String elementType)
        get the tag of element by webelement type.
        参数:
        elementType - link/button/edit/checkbox/image/list and so on
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
